document.full_text: gold surged to a record high on friday for the third straight day, as investors kept up a buying frenzy fueled by the outlook for low u.s. interest rates that has propelled bullion to its seventh consecutive weekly rise, its longest winning streak since 2007.
document.title: gold jumps 2 percent to set record high for third day
lines_and_colors: gold surged to a record high on friday for the third straight day, as investors kept up a buying frenzy fueled by the outlook for low u.s. interest rates that has propelled bullion to its seventh consecutive weekly rise, its longest winning streak since 2007.
